system.description:
No matter how deadly or serious an opponent is, if they can drink, you can splash something down their throat with superlative timing.

Make a Persuasion check opposed by the Insight check of a creature within your reach. On a success, the creature drinks whatever item you are offering to it, whether that is a potion, poison, or otherwise. Any alchemical item (such as an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.b0z0yz39b3qy3hdo]{Acid Flask} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.4t0m2ttaca5hg2vi]{Alchemist's Fire}) deals four times as much damage as normal when a creature drinks it in this way, although any ongoing damage is only dealt twice.
